title: Storage Location
description: A physical location (such as a building, room, cabinet or drawer) within the holding institution where objects associated with the collection description are stored or exhibited.

properties.name: hasAddress
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Address class.

properties.name: hasIdentifier
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.

properties.name: hasMeasurementOrFact
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the MeasurementOrFact class.

properties.name: hasReference
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Reference class.

properties.name: locationDescription
properties.description: Short textual description of the storage location of the group of items

properties.name: locationName
properties.description: A label used to identify a place where the collection is stored.

properties.name: locationType
properties.description: The nature of the location where the collection is stored.
